subject: College World Series
Baseball (College)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Will Allen drove in the go-ahead run in the seventh inning, Mississippi relievers held Texas Christian without a hit after Kevin Cron’s homer in the fifth, and the Rebels stayed alive in the College World Series with a 6-4 victory Thursday night in Omaha.
